text:
@bbcquestiontime @DavidLammy @nadhimzahawi 50,000 preventable deaths. Govt’s own figures. Now explain why our PM is proud ? Explain how that is doing well ? Explain how our death rate for one day = entire EU deaths. 

Resign @nadhimzahawi , you’re a puppet not a Minister. 

#NotMovingOn 

https://t.co/jrchP5TUD7
